description: A star with six points, and a dot in the center. Similar to the Star of David emoji.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the dotted six-pointed star emoji is a delicate and intricate symbol, appearing as a precisely rendered star composed of tiny, shimmering dots. The soft gradients and subtle glow applied by Apple give it an ethereal quality, making each dot seem to radiate a gentle light. This unique celestial representation can symbolize magic, wonder, guidance, or even a special achievement, adding a touch of enchantment to messages.
